text.p: Marathon Financial Corp said on Tuesday it has commenced an initial offering of 500,000 shares of its common stock.
The company applied for listing on the Nasdaq Small Cap market, a company spokeswoman said.
Of the shares to be offered, 100,000 shares are first being offered to the corporation's shareholders of record on June 24, 1996 at $5.00 per share, Marathon Financial said.
The offering to shareholders will terminate September 24, 1996, Marathon Financial said.

Any shares unsubscribed for by the shareholders of the corporation, plus the 400,000 additional shares, will be offered to the public on a best efforts basis by McKinnon & Co Inc, the managing underwriter for the public offering, at an estimated price of between $4.75 and $5.75 per share, Marathon Financial said.
Marathon Financial Corp is a bank holding company with $42 million in assets as of the end of June.
